titleStmt.title: Replyes for Alexander Monro of Bearcrofts and the answers made to the petition and information presented by him to the Commissioner his Grace, and Estates of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Monroe, Alexander, fl. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: p. 15-16 bound and filmed out of order; whole stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
